price: ខ្ញុំមិនបានដឹងអំពីរឿងម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់ដែលនៅលើមេឃ ខណៈដែលពួកគេប្រកែកគ្នា(ពីរឿងបង្កើតអាដាំ)ឡើយ។
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
